translation.app.title: Sample Asp.Net Core - React Docker App
translation.home.hero.title:
Welcome to Sample Asp.Net Core - React Docker
 Application
translation.home.hero.subtitle: This is a sample app using Asp.Net Core, React, and Docker for development and production.
translation.home.features.title: Features
translation.home.features.ease.title: Ease of setup 📤
translation.home.features.ease.description: With SampleAspNetReactDockerApp template, you can easily set up a new project with pre-configured Asp.Net Core, React, and Docker.
translation.home.features.consistency.title: Consistent Development Environment for development and production📋
translation.home.features.consistency.description: With Docker, you can easily set up a development environment that is consistent across different machines, ready for development and production.
translation.home.features.npm.title: React with extra npm packages🗂️
translation.home.features.npm.description: This template comes with extra npm packages like react-router-dom, tailwindcss, zustand, i18next, and more, to help you get started with your project.
